name: Puppertrator
description:
LDJAM37 93rd place!

Oh no! You've been falsely accused of stealing Fluffy Flufferton's super special (and very secret) stash bones! Worse yet, he knocked you out and trapped you in his basement. You'll have to use your better-than-human eyesight to find clues about who the real perpetrator in... PUPPERTRATOR.

Brought to you by the WYATTO & KRISPIN SHOW FEAT. CADILLAC LOOPS

Like the game? Check out WYATTO's games: http://notfruit.net

Like the artwork? Check out KRISPIN's art: http://medamaudee.tumblr.com/tagged/my-art

Like the music? Check out CADILLAC LOOPS' music: http://www.cadillacloops.com/eng/

If you'd prefer to play this game in the browser you can do that here.
